name: TCPal
tagline: iPhone companion app to the Tradecraft experience~
body:
### Check out TCPal!
Would you like to [download the latest version](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/132244/TCPal/download.html) for your iPhone?

### Get involved!
Here are some ways you can help make this better:
- [Suggest improvements](http://www.tricider.com/admin/35Kuohj7U6V/EcZLhMg5cW7)
- Design either new parts or existing parts that could be better :)
- Engineer new parts, fix bugs, generally help make the suggested improvements become real
- Start the Android app?
- Come up with new bullet points for this list??
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
